title: How to unsubscribe from Prom Smart UA
description: To cancel your Prom Smart UA subscription, you'll need to manage it through the platform where you initially subscribed. This could be directly through Prom.ua, PromptSmart, the Shopify App store, or Proom AI. The steps will vary depending on the specific service and your subscription method.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your 'Prom Smart UA' subscription via the website:

*   Go to the website for the 'Prom Smart UA' service you are using (Prom.ua, PromptSmart, or Proom AI).
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to your account settings or profile.
*   Look for a 'Subscription' or 'Billing' section.
*   Find your active 'Prom Smart UA' subscription.
*   Click on 'Cancel Subscription' or a similar option.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm the cancellation.

steps_2.title: Unsubscribe via Shopify App
steps_2.description:
To cancel your 'Prom Smart UA' subscription via the Shopify App:

*   Go to the Shopify App for the 'Prom Smart UA' service.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to your account settings or profile.
*   Look for a 'Subscription' or 'Billing' section.
*   Find your active 'Prom Smart UA' subscription.
*   Click on 'Cancel Subscription' or a similar option.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm the cancellation.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Prom Smart UA subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to manage your subscription and avoid unwanted charges. Whether you subscribed through Prom.ua, PromptSmart, the Shopify App store, or Proom AI, we'll help you through the cancellation process.
